inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AuditLogs
| where SourceSystem == "Azure AD"
| summarize count() by Result, TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AuditLogs
| where SourceSystem == "Azure AD"
| where Result == "failure"
| summarize count() by Category

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AuditLogs
| where SourceSystem == "Azure AD"
| summarize count() by Result

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AuditLogs
| where SourceSystem == "Azure AD"
| summarize count() by Category

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AuditLogs
| where SourceSystem == "Azure AD"
| extend initiator= tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName)
| where initiator!= "" 
| summarize count() by initiator, TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AuditLogs
| where SourceSystem == "Azure AD"
| extend initiatingUserPrincipalName = tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName)
| where initiatingUserPrincipalName != "" 
| summarize Activities = count() by initiatingUserPrincipalName
| sort by Activities desc nulls last

content.Query:
AuditLogs
| where SourceSystem == "Azure AD"
| extend initiator= tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName)
| where initiator!= "" 
| summarize Activities = count() by initiator| sort by Activities desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AuditLogs
| where SourceSystem == "Azure AD"
| extend initiatorType = iff(tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName) != "", 'User', iff(tostring(InitiatedBy.app.displayName) != "", 'App', 'None'))
| summarize count() by initiatorType

content.PartTitle: Audit log events, by initiator type

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AuditLogs
| where SourceSystem == "Azure AD"
| extend initiator = tostring(InitiatedBy.app.displayName)
| where initiator != "" 
| summarize count() by initiator, TimeGenerated

AuditLogs

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AuditLogs
| where SourceSystem == "Azure AD"
| where Category == "UserManagement"
| summarize count() by TimeGenerated, Result

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AuditLogs
| where SourceSystem == "Azure AD"
| where Category == "UserManagement"
| where Result == "failure"
| extend initiatingUserPrincipalName = tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName)
| project TimeGenerated, initiatingUserPrincipalName, OperationName, ResultReason

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AuditLogs
| where SourceSystem == "Azure AD"
| where Category == "UserManagement"
| where OperationName  !contains "password"
| summarize Activities = count() by OperationName, TimeGenerated

inputs.value:
AuditLogs

| where Category == "UserManagement"
| where OperationName  !contains "password"

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AuditLogs
| where SourceSystem == "Azure AD"
| where Category == "UserManagement"
| extend initiatingUserPrincipalName = iff(tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName) != "", tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName), "N/A")
| where OperationName contains "password"
| summarize Activities = count() by OperationName, TimeGenerated

content.Query:
AuditLogs
| where SourceSystem == "Azure AD"
| where Category == "UserManagement"
| where OperationName  contains "password"
| summarize Activities = count() by OperationName, TimeGenerated

AuditLogs

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AuditLogs
| where SourceSystem == "Azure AD"
| where Category == "UserManagement"
| extend initiator = tostring(InitiatedBy.app.displayName)
| where initiator != "" 
| summarize count() by initiator, OperationName
| sort by count_ desc 
| summarize NumberOfOperations = sum(count_), Top3Operations = makelist(OperationName, 3) by initiator

content.Query:
AuditLogs
| where SourceSystem == "Azure AD"
| where Category == "UserManagement"
| extend initiator = tostring(InitiatedBy.app.displayName)
| where initiator != "" 
| summarize count() by initiator, OperationName
| sort by count_ desc 
| summarize NumberOfOperations = sum(count_), Top3Operations = makelist(OperationName, 3) by initiator
| sort by NumberOfOperations desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AuditLogs
| where SourceSystem == "Azure AD"
| where Category == "GroupManagement"
| project TimeGenerated, OperationName, initiatingUserPrincipalName = tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName), numTargets = array_length(TargetResources)
| where initiatingUserPrincipalName != "" 
| summarize sum(numTargets) by OperationName, initiatingUserPrincipalName, TimeGenerated
